text.section: There is a Handgun Roster Board in the Department of State Police.

section.section:
Of the 11 members of the Board:
one shall be the Secretary as an ex officio member;
ten shall be appointed by the Governor with the advice and consent of the Senate; and
all shall be Maryland residents.

text.section: The term of an appointed member is 4 years.
The Secretary shall serve as chairman.
The Board shall meet at the request of the chairman or of a majority of the members.
